This game can be fun, but the players in it can make it more toxic than COD. Killers can camp hooks, some killers are absurdly OP. Survivors can just constantly loop the killer with overpowered perks. This game has terribly unbalanced perks and killers. The hit reg and hit boxes in the game just genuinely make you want to die. overall its just a shit show of a poorly developed game and its not worth buying.

This game has not changed yet is very different than it was since I started playing 3 years ago.  Each update makes the game more broken than the last and bugs do not get addressed for months to even years at a time.  

First and most important, new players are going to struggle with even getting to the point where you have everything on just one character.  If you purchase every dlc right away and try to get every perk unlocked, that's going to take you about 1k hours and I kid you not.  Even with every survivor being the same it's still a time sink.  As for killer?  I haven't even gotten to the point nor do I care to.  It's such a grind and I only leveled about 4 killers max.

Hackers have become a major issue too, I don't play as much as I use to but with the new chapter patch, I have seen 10 different hackers and have even dodged ones I knew by name.  

MMR is about what everyone else has been saying,  I like playing with different non meta perks, but as killer now, it makes games unbearble.  If I lose it's whatever to me, but each game is a stomp unless I use meta stuff, even then I have to sweat if I even want to get even a 2k.  Survivor matches become the same too, unfun for different reasons,  Same killers over and over that usually get stomped themselves even when I play with whatever perks.

As soon as I finish this rift, this game is done for me.  I may touch it every chapter update that's free but I will not drop another dime on this until there's significant improvement.
we all hate this game but we all play it

Dead by Daylight идеально воссоздает кульминацию почти любого слэшера: когда сценами обильного кровопускания зрителей уже развлекли и дело идет к развязке. Выжившие герои нашли путь к спасению. Они уже знают, что именно нужно сделать, чтобы ускользнуть от маньяка и вернуться домой, сохранив все конечности. Но безжалостный убийца идет по пятам. Все решают минуты. История вот-вот закончится. Зрители замерли в напряжении

Beside it disconnecting me occasionally, and my game crashing rarely, DBD is a SUPER fun game. I would spend so many more hours playing it if I didn't have to be responsible. It's so fun, I would 100% recommend buying this game!

I had to put in a good amount of time to really come to the conclusion I really wasn't exaggerating lol. This game is made for the killers, not the survivors. Poorly balanced non-sense. Friday the 13th is still a better game by design. Maybe a collab would benefit both parties..

Game has a really hard time balancing survivors and killers.  At this state, killers and the perks they come with are way too strong, and the few counters survivors get for those built in features the killers get are a handful of perks.  This creates a cycle where the only viable way to play against a good killer is to run the same 4-5 "meta" perks.  When everyone has to run the same build for survivors, it ruins the fun and flavor of creating your own build that synergizes well with other perks.  IF you want to play killer, the game would be more appealing to you.
Scary, fun, and is always updating with new content for Horror lovers. It is most fun playing with friends!
